Player History
Drafted in 20th round, 320th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Had first career hit on 8/10/2015, off Clark Staggs (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/25/2015, off George Coletti (STL)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Philadelphia on 2/17/2016 (Going to CIN: 3B Edward Clinard. Going to PHI: DH Asa Kelemen, RF Donald Lamberth, 3B Walter Womac)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2016, hitting .458 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis (C) on 6/21/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/17/2017 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis (C) on 6/26/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2018, hitting .444 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 7/22/2018...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,892,857 through salary arbitration...

Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
